data.name: command.start.welcome
data.value:
*Welcome!*
_Sirena BOT_ offers a convenient mechanism for instant notifications. The primary goal of the bot is to create a notification system where the focus is on the event, not the message author.
You can create notifications (_Sirens_) and invite people to subscribe to alerts for meetings, gatherings, or any other events. Whether itâ€™s a work meeting, a parent-teacher conference, a meetup with friends, or a clan raid, you can easily notify all subscribers about the time and place of the event.
Use the Menu (/menu) to manage the bot or directly call commands. To see a list of available commands, type /help.
This bot is especially useful in work chats, parent groups, or community chats, where it's important to avoid unnecessary discussions while still staying informed about urgent messages.

data.name: command.subscribe.askSirenaId
data.value:
*Please input Sirena ID*. You have to input exact ID of Sirena that you are going to subscribe to.
You can use *Find* command to find a Sirena by title.

Try another *Sirena ID*
